content_analysis.posting_frequency: Once per week is industry standard for Instagram. Uses batch content strategy with repurposing across platforms.
content_formats: Reels (1.3M reels tagged with Tony Robbins)
content_analysis.style_notes: Instagram content is less produced and more behind-the-scenes compared to other platforms. Focus on authentic, real moments. Content disappears quickly unless it goes viral. Uses AI chatbot feature ('DM AI — ask Tony anything, 24/7') for engagement.

content_strategy.posting_rule: 85-10-5 Rule by David Meerman Scott - Only 1 in 20 posts should be about selling. Focus on value, connection, and inspiration.
content_strategy.content_philosophy: People don't want another sales pitch. They want inspiration, connection, and realness. People aren't buying products, they're buying feelings.
content_strategy.platform_specific_approach: Content tailored specifically for Instagram rather than copy-paste from other platforms. Behind-the-scenes focus that audiences expect on Instagram.
content_strategy.content_multiplier_method: Repurpose and tailor content for specific platforms to maximize reach. Contributor on Entrepreneur.com, Medium, and LinkedIn as well.
content_strategy.engagement_focus: Where focus goes, energy flows - emphasis on authentic connection over selling

bio_elements.bio_text: DM 'AI' — ask Tony anything, 24/7. Empowering you to create the extraordinary life you deserve
bio_elements.cta_strategy: AI chatbot for 24/7 engagement, link to events and resources

reels_performance.format_preference: Short-form, high-energy content with quick value delivery
